text: Ezɨ Samuel ghaze, “Nɨ gumazir avɨribav soghezɨ me ariaghire, ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn gumazir nɨ mɨsoghezɨ ariaghirezibar amebaba, me ua boriba puvatɨ. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn nɨn amebam uaghan amebar kabar mɨn ikiam.” Egha Gilgalɨn nguibamɨn, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn, Samuel Agakɨn mɨsuegha an kuam aghora bar a nguemsiri.
